EVILS COURT

AKNP-0005

"The farce called a trial begins."

mothy's seventh album featuring new songs alongside other previously-released songs since EVILS FOREST released on August 13, 2011. The album is licensed through KARENT and is available on Apple Music, Amazon, and Spotify.

Website · Crossfade · Playlist · Booklet

Tracklist

  1. Five Minutes Before Court (instrumental)
  2. master of the court
  3. Chrono Story
  4. Recollective Musicbox
  5. Tree Maiden ~Millennium Wiegenlied~
  6. gift from the Princess who Bought Sleep
  7. Fifth Pierrot
  8. Madam Merry-Go-Round
  9. Judgment of Corruption
  10. Capriccio Farce
  11. Red Shoe Parade

Notes

  • The album was illustrated by Ichika.
  • The album is narrated by Gammon Octo, the new "Gardener" replacing "Ma"; the beginning of the album features a piece of prose about his past.
  • The lyrics pages feature alternate English titles for each song alongside commentary from Gammon.
  • The ending of the booklet features a list of the four endings with illustrations of each of their masters; the Master of the Heavenly Yard is the only one facing away from the viewer.
